page.title: 12Childrens Clubs
page.content:
I go to the first{Callington B. Cub {Scout pack.}You pay fifteen pence and you play games and have to earn badges. I've got my bronze arrow. When the weather is good we are taken out. We go on{camps}and there is a weekend camp at the end of term.
In{Callington Football Club}there is an A and a B team. For under 12's, you have to pay 25p for matches and for practice. The pitch is as big as a proper pitch.{ { Pottery }is at Celliwic gift shop. Pottery is from 3.40 to 5 0' clock. This is on Wednesdays. {Scouts}are on Fridays from 7 to 9. You pay 20 pence. You see rallies and go on road patrols. The Scouts help with Sunday market. In scouts you go on more adventurous camps. Camps are usually for about a week.
